unnamed:Strike.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has ** no [Artifact]: Apply !M! [Amplification].
unnamed:Strike.NAME: Strike

unnamed:AttackOrder.DESCRIPTION: Mark the enemy. || Activate the first ** Doll that intends ** to {Attack}.
unnamed:AttackOrder.NAME: Attack Order

unnamed:CleavingAttack.DESCRIPTION: Give a Doll +!S! [Strength]. ** It can attack ALL ** enemies this turn.
unnamed:CleavingAttack.NAME: Cleaving Attacks

unnamed:DefenseOrder.DESCRIPTION: Activate the first ** Doll that intends to {Defend} and give ** it +!M! Max [HP].
unnamed:DefenseOrder.NAME: Defense Order

unnamed:Diversion.DESCRIPTION: Reshuffle all {Skills} ** in hand: Apply ** !M! [Amplification] for each.
unnamed:Diversion.NAME: Diversion

unnamed:Fireblast.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 {Burn} to ** your draw pile. || Solo: Give it {~Ethereal}.
unnamed:Fireblast.NAME: Fireblast

unnamed:LingeringSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Once this combat, ** pay !M! [E]: Summon ** 1 Doll, then heal all ** Dolls for !S! [HP].
unnamed:LingeringSpirit.NAME: Lingering Spirit

unnamed:Preparation.DESCRIPTION: Solo: Fetch 1 card. || Retain !M! card(s). You ** can't draw additional ** cards this turn.
unnamed:Preparation.NAME: Preparation

unnamed:RecklessRitual.DESCRIPTION: Summon 1 Doll. || Gain !S! [SK]. Draw !M! ** less card(s) next turn.
unnamed:RecklessRitual.NAME: Reckless Ritual

unnamed:Rejuvenate.DESCRIPTION: Heal a Doll for !M! [HP]. || At the start of each ** combat: Heal !S! [HP].
unnamed:Rejuvenate.NAME: Rejuvenate

unnamed:ChanneledStrike.DESCRIPTION: Mark the enemy. || {~Recast}: Deals !M! ** additional damage.
unnamed:ChanneledStrike.NAME: Channeled Strike

unnamed:Retrace.DESCRIPTION: Reshuffle all ** {Attacks} in hand: ** Gain +!M! [Block] for each.
unnamed:Retrace.NAME: Retrace

unnamed:RisingEdge.DESCRIPTION: Next turn: Add this to ** your hand with +1 cost ** and +!M! damage.
unnamed:RisingEdge.NAME: Rising Edge

unnamed:AbsorbEssence.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to a ** Doll. Next turn: Gain ** [E] and <DRW>.
unnamed:AbsorbEssence.NAME: Capture Essence

unnamed:AdvancedSummon.NAME: Advanced Ritual
unnamed:AdvancedSummon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon 1 Doll. ** Give it +!S! [Strength] [Dexterity] ** and Activate it.

unnamed:Battleplans.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn, ** discard !M! random ** card(s): Activate 1 Doll.
unnamed:Battleplans.NAME: Battleplans

unnamed:BloodBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [Metallicize]. || At the start ** of each turn: ALL ** Allies lose !S! [HP].
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn, Allies lose #b{0} [HP].
unnamed:BloodBarrier.NAME: Blood Barrier

unnamed:Decay.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! [Withering] [Amplification]. || At the start of combat: Lose 1 Summon slot.
unnamed:Decay.NAME: Decay

unnamed:Deflect.DESCRIPTION: When Retained: ** Gain !M! [Block]. || If Reshuffled from your ** hand: Gain !S! [Block].
unnamed:Deflect.NAME: Deflect

unnamed:ElementalMastery.DESCRIPTION: Motivate !M! {~Elemental} ** {Attacks} in your draw pile. || Raise this card's cost ** by 1 and [Block] by !S!.
unnamed:ElementalMastery.NAME: Elemental Mastery

unnamed:Enchain.DESCRIPTION: <DRW>. || If you played ** {Enchain} this turn: ** Apply !M! [Constricted].
unnamed:Enchain.NAME: Enchain

unnamed:Enrage.DESCRIPTION: Attach: +!M! Max [HP]. ** Whenever it loses ** [HP]: Give it +!S! [Strength].
unnamed:Enrage.NAME: Enrage

unnamed:Equilibrium.DESCRIPTION: Reshuffle up to !M! cards. ** Next turn: Draw that ** many additional cards.
unnamed:Equilibrium.NAME: Equilibrium

unnamed:FocusedEffort.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 Doll: Change ** ALL Dolls to have its ** same intent, then ** Activate them.
unnamed:FocusedEffort.NAME: Focused Effort

unnamed:InstantCut.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! [Amplification]. || If Reshuffled from your ** hand: Deal !S! damage ** to ALL enemies.
unnamed:InstantCut.NAME: Instant Cut

unnamed:LightningStrike.DESCRIPTION: <LIM>. If the ** enemy has !M! or ** more [Amplification]: Stun it.
unnamed:LightningStrike.NAME: Lightning Strike

unnamed:LivingArmor.DESCRIPTION: Solo: Gain !M! [Plated Armor]. || Attach: +!S! [Dexterity]. ** Whenever it is healed: ** Give it +!S! Max [HP].
unnamed:LivingArmor.NAME: Living Armor

unnamed:Obfuscate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temp [Dexterity]. || Apply !S! [Withering] to ** ALL enemies.
unnamed:Obfuscate.NAME: Obfuscate

unnamed:Offering.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! [HP]. || Summon 1 Doll: ** Give it +!S! Max [HP].
unnamed:Offering.NAME: Offering

unnamed:Scorch.DESCRIPTION: Remove all [Block] ** from the enemy. || If it has [Strength]: It also ** loses !M! [Strength].
unnamed:Scorch.NAME: Scorch

unnamed:TwinSummoning.DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! card(s). || Summon !S! Dolls ** of the same type.
unnamed:TwinSummoning.NAME: Twin Summon

unnamed:Unravel.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the top !M! cards ** of your draw pile. || In !S! turns: Add !K! of ** them to your hand.
unnamed:Unravel.NAME: Unravel
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: In #b{0} turn(s), #yFetch #b{1} of these cards from your #yExhaust pile: NL

unnamed:Unburden.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 Hindrance to ** give ALL Allies +!M! [Strength]. || Solo: Exhaust from ** any pile instead.
unnamed:Unburden.NAME: Unburden

unnamed:EndlessResearch.DESCRIPTION: Choose and play 1 of the ** top !M! cards of your draw ** pile. Discard the rest. || If you choose a {0-Cost} ** card: Repeat this effect.
unnamed:EndlessResearch.NAME: Endless Research

unnamed:Reflection.DESCRIPTION: Stun a Doll and ** Summon a copy of it. || Solo: Draw 1 copy of ** each {Attack} in hand ** and Motivate them.
unnamed:Reflection.NAME: Reflection

unnamed:InfinitePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn: ** Gain 1 [E], [Strength] and [Block]. || Once per turn: Pay !M! [E]: ** Raise cost and effect by 1.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Pay #b{0} [E] to stack this power, then raise this cost by #b1. || At the start of each turn, gain #b{1} [E], [Strength] and [Block].
unnamed:InfinitePower.NAME: Infinite Power

unnamed:LonesomeSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Start of turn, Solo: ** Gain !M! [Strength] (Max !S!). || End of turn, Solo: ** Gain !M! [Dexterity] (Max !S!).
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Start of turn, if #ySolo, gain #b{0} [Strength] ( #b{1} remaining). ** At the end of turn, if #ySolo, gain #b{0} [Dexterity] ( #b{2} remaining).
unnamed:LonesomeSpirit.NAME: Lonesome Spirit

unnamed:NamelessCrown.DESCRIPTION: Solo: Gain !M! [Strength] [Dexterity], !S! [THP]. ** Lose ALL Summon slots. || Attach: Once per turn, ** when Activated: Double ** the intent effect.
unnamed:NamelessCrown.NAME: Nameless Crown

unnamed:ChainLightning.DESCRIPTION: Apply !S! [Amplification] per hit. || Choose the first target. ** Cannot damage the same ** enemy twice in a row.
unnamed:ChainLightning.NAME: Chain Lightning

unnamed:RuneCarving.DESCRIPTION: <LIM>. Choose 1 of !M! ** random cards in your ** deck: Permanently raise ** damage and [Block] by !S! ** (+1 in Unnamed Reign).
unnamed:RuneCarving.NAME: Rune Carving

unnamed:SoulGathering.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a character ** dies: Gain 1 stack. || Once per turn, pay !M! ** stacks: Choose 1 effect.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Pay #b{0} stacks: Choose #b1 effect. || Whenever a character dies, gain #b{1} stacks(s).
unnamed:SoulGathering.NAME: Gather Souls

unnamed:SummoningArts.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Summon ** a Doll: Give it +!M! [Strength] [Dexterity]. || Whenever you change a Doll ** intent: Give it +!S! Max [HP].
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you #ySummon a #yDoll: Give it +#b{0} [Strength] [Dexterity]. ** Whenever you change a #yDoll intent: Give it +#b{1} Max [HP].
unnamed:SummoningArts.NAME: Summoning Arts

unnamed:Transcend_Space.DESCRIPTION: Apply [Amplification] and [Withering] to ** each enemy equal to ** their current intent ** damage (max !S!).
unnamed:Transcend_Space.NAME: Astromancy

unnamed:Transcend_Time.DESCRIPTION: Reshuffle all cards in ** hand. <DRW-M> ** from the top of your ** discard pile.
unnamed:Transcend_Time.NAME: Chronomancy

unnamed:Status_Burn.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. || At the end of turn: ** Take !M! damage.
unnamed:Status_Burn.NAME: Burn
